tasks.label: Initialize NestJS Backend API
tasks.command: npm i -g @nestjs/cli && nest new super-admin-api && cd super-admin-api && npm install @nestjs/typeorm typeorm pg @nestjs/config && npm install @nestjs/jwt passport passport-jwt bcrypt && npm install --save-dev @types/passport-jwt @types/bcrypt

tasks.label: Initialize Next.js Frontend
tasks.command: npx create-next-app@latest super-admin-frontend && cd super-admin-frontend && npm install antd axios

tasks.label: Initialize MiniPortal Demo
tasks.command: npm create vite@latest mini-portal-demo -- --template react-ts && cd mini-portal-demo && npm install
